llm_response.Key Information Summary: IfcSlab element named 'Floor:DCH_DÄ+BLECH_113' with multiple material layers including 'Dämmung - weich' (soft insulation), 'Dachdeckung - Blechdach' (metal roof covering), 'Dachdeckung - Bitumenbahn' (bitumen membrane), and 'Dachdeckung - Holz' (wood roof covering). Classified under 'Floors' category with Bauteilklasse 'A_Dachbekleidung' (roof covering) and Bauteilart 'Dachabdeckung' (roof covering).
